head.title: Union Academy Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Union Academy Charter School in a public K-12 charter school located in Monroe, NC. It was founded in 2000.

header.h2: UA is closed March 16-May 15 due to COVID-19.

div.p: For the latest information about UA's closing and updates, click on FULL STORY or go to our ALL SCHOOL NEWS page.

div.div: Queens Grant High School, 10323 Idlewild Rd, Matthews, NC 28105, USA

h3.a: This Week's News from the Nest

div.div: Wondering what we've been up to? We love to share! Just click above and check out our latest newsletter. Be sure to stop back each week and read up on all of the latest things going on all over Union Academy. Lower, middle, and high - we've got it all covered! To read back issues, visit the Communications page.

h3.a: UA is closed March 16-May 15 due to COVID-19.

div.div: For the latest information about UA's closing and updates, click on FULL STORY or go to our ALL SCHOOL NEWS page.
Governor Roy Cooper announced today in his press conference that North Carolina schools will NOT reopen this year.
We hope you are having a great Spring Break. Below are a few updates for the week.

address.span: 675 N. Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.
